reviews.comments: Me encanta el  lugar el orden la limpieza el silencio, es muy amplio ideal para 2 o 3 personas, muy pintoresco y acogedor
Es un edificio de mas de 100 años, el depto está muy bien restaurado y ambientado. Andreas fue muy atento. Lo recomiendo.
Espacio muy agradable, con lo necesario para pasar el momento y silencioso para dormir. Recomendable. Andreas fue muy amable.
El lugar es muy fiel a lo publicado con increíble luz natural. Andreas es muy amable y atento. Volvería sin lugar a dudas!
Gran lugar y gran anfitrión. El espacio estaba impecable y era muy cómodo. Ubicación óptima. Conveniente para todo tipo se estancia.

El departamento es lo que figura en las fotos y mejor todavia, una limpieza muy prolija de cada detalle, tiene una cocina muy completa que el que necesita tiene a disposición muchos intrumentos de cocina.
No funcionaba el bidet y tuvimos problema con las luces
Super comodo, limpio, luminoso, moderno y centrico. Ideal para parejas y familia. Edificio tranquilo. Accesible y facil de llegar. Recomiendo 100%.
El lugar es mejor que lo que se ve en las imágenes, muy ordenado y limpio, cómodo para llegar y permanecer.
Un departamento acogedor, simple, limpio, elemental con lo que cualquiera necesita para unos días en el lugar. El anfitrión se ha puesto a nuestra disposicion con absoluta discreción.

El departamento es tal cual como sale en las fotos y en la descripción. Muy luminoso y aireado. Tiene una distribución muy cómoda y espacio suficiente para varios huéspedes. La ubicacion es buena y esta bien conectada con el transporte público.

El departamento es muy lindo, sencillo pero cómodo y tambien iluminado y fresco. Nuestra estadia fue de mes y medio y Andy fue muy amable  facilitando solucion a cualquier inconveniente. Gracias por todo! Feliz año nuevo
Fueron muy amables
El departamento es como se ve en la publicación, un poco más bello en persona. Muy bien ubicado en un barrio con mucha vida.
El apartamento es como se ve en las fotos, Andreas es una persona muy amable
Excelente lugar!!! Muy recomendado
Todo ok. Especialmente el estilo y la limpieza
Excelente locacion y el dpto de 10
Muy preocupado, Andreas. Muy comunicativo y atento con mi familia. Lo recomiendo.
El apartamento está genial, arquitectura muy linda y buena Ubicación. Andreas es muy buena gente y muy gentil! Sus gatos son la alegría de la casa, muy curiosos y amables! Nos encantó :)
Es muy buen anfitrión. El loft tiene todo lo que se requiere de un Air BnB. El lugar está céntrico a varios lugares caminando a pie toma Entre 15 y 20 min para llegar a cualquier lugar.

Fue muy lindo el apartamento, con mucho espacio, limpio y tranquilo. No hay aire acondicionado pero ventanas y ventiladores lo que permite pasar una buena noche. El apartamento tiene todo lo necesario y puede convenir a amigos o una familia. Además, Andreas es una persona agradable y amable que te acoge re bien. No puedo decir más porque nos quedamos una sola noche, pero fue re tranquilo y la pasamos re bien !

Deben informar con tiempo que no sirve el ascensor . A mí me avisaron un día antes de llegar. Los pisos son altos y los 100 escalones son sofocantes. No daban ganas de subir, amen que en algunos pisos no hay Iuz y da un poco de miedo
reviews.response: Hola Jorge, mil disculpas por la inconveniencia. El ascensor se descompuso justo un día antes de tu llegada y ya está funcionando nuevamente. Perdón!

reviews.comments: Muy bueno, lindo, todo limpio y ordenado , volveré .
We rented Andreas place for a photoshooting. He had no troubles since we were a lot of people: models, us two make up artists, photographer etc! We loved the place it was perfect!

I had a lovely stay at Andreas place. He was very helpful. The apartment was full of light, and the mezzanine lovely to work from. Andreas was very helpful with everything. I would definitely stay again.

Andreas Apartment war sehr sauber und gut klimatisiert. Speziell war der Aufzug, ein echtes Highlight! Die Lage ist zentral und in der Umgebung findet man alles was man braucht. Klare Empfehlung für einen angenehmen Aufenthalt in Buenos Aires.
Andreas’ place was perfect for our short stay in Buenos Aires. The space was super-stylish and full of character, and the neighbourhood felt safe and buzzing. We would definitely stay again.
Really enjoyed the stay in this apartment!  Good location, well equipped beautiful place and Andreas was a good host!!
Andreas is a great host and will respond quickly to any enquiries. Space itself is very nice, minimal and clean. Area is nice and quiet with plenty of shops nearby too.

Good value clean nice space easy walking to anywhere very nice cafe/bar just around the corner 
Felt safe all the time!

Hospedagem ótima, lugar limpo, 5 quadras do metrô. Andreas nos emprestou um cartão do transporte público que foi muito útil, porque usamos no metrô e no ônibus.
Recomendo!
Andreas' place was even better than the pictures and he was very helpful when I needed extra time to store my luggage.

Andreas was a great host, and the apartment is immaculate! I arrived much later then expected but Andreas was very understanding and accommodating. He is an excellent communicator and provided everything I needed. The neighborhood was great from the little I saw, and the building itself is beautiful! Would definitely come back :)
Das Loft ist wunderschön, gemütlich und gut gelegen. Man hat alles was man braucht und Andreas ist ein toller Gastgeber, hilfsbereit, freundlich und immer ansprechbar. Absolute Empfehlung!!
Excellent apartment! Highly recommended!
Andreas and his flatmate helped me get ride to the airport which was crucial on Christmas am.
Very beautiful apartment, centrally located and helpful hosts. Everything was as on the pics, the Wifi worked perfectly as well Recommended.

Appartement très agréable, esprit loft cool, et idéalement situé.
Nous y reviendrons pour une prochaine escale à BA

Andreas was quick with responding to all our questions and was a fantastic host (Very friendly and fluent in English)
 
The loft apartment was clean, well equipped with the necessities (fridge, stove, towels,soap etc) and located near buses/train station ( 5-10min walk).  

Only difficulty we had was getting into the apartment with the key but slightly pushing the knob up while turning the key seemed to do the trick (for future uses) 
 
Overall, Great stay and I’d definitely be back!
We had a great stay at Andreas’s flat! It was very clean, easy to find, and in a nice neighborhood. Would definitely recommend staying here while in Buenos Aires.

Andreas was super to coordinate with, and very accommodating. The place was clean, lovely and exactly as described. We enjoyed wandering around the San Telmo área, which is easy walking distance. Unbeatable value.

Andreas’s place was very clean, very cute and confortable. Andreas was quick to accommodate our flight delays which was very much appreciated. Than you for the little touches such as fruits and allowing us a late checkout. I recommend this place.
Schicke, saubere und geräumige Unterkunft. Vor allem aber auch ruhig, obwohl mitten in der Stadt.
Andreas' place was just as pictured and we had a great time!
Beautiful space! I would stay here again.

Das gemütliche Loft ist genau wie auf den Fotos. Es ist ideal gelegen um die umliegenden Viertel zu Fuss zu erkunden, mit bequemen Schuhen und etwas Zeit sogar bis nach La Boca. Das Appartement ist sehr sauber, gut ausgestattet und sogar flauschige Duschtücher standen uns zur Verfügung. Da die Fenster zum Innnenhof zeigen ist es sehr ruhig und wir konnten uns nach anstrengendem Sightseeing erholen. Andreas war bei unserer Ankunft da, hat uns Tipps gegeben und war stets erreichbar. Vielen lieben Dank, wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt!

Great experience, Andreas was very  welcoming, gave good advices about the restaurants in the area, and very accommodent for the check-in and check-out. The apartment was simply but well decorated, comfortable, clean, very sunny, well located and very quiet. We warmly recommend this place!
Andreas was very quick to respond to messages and we had an easy check in to this Airbnb. The apartment is very cute.
I really enjoyed Andrea's flat. I wish I had more time to stay in it. It is walking distance to the great area of San Telmo. I would recommend it.

Andreas' loft is beautiful, convenient and accessible! We had no troubles here and we really enjoyed our stay here. Thank you Andreas for being so fast with replying to request and your friendly nature. :)

Das Apartment ist groß und gemütlich eingerichtet. Das Bad und die Küche sind gut ausgestattet und das Bett ist sehr gemütlich. Das Apartment liegt relativ zentral und man kann  vieles zu Fuß erreichen. Die U-Bahn ist nur ein paar Blocks entfernt! Sehr empfehlenswert!

Andrea's is a wonderful host who is understanding and helpful. He made the visit smooth and he was attentive and clear about all his communications. I am deeply pleased that I had the opportunity to stay in this lovely loft and I hope to do so on my next visit to Buenos Aires!
Its a cute apartment near downtown/ San Telmo. The building is pretty old, but still a very spacious place with great WIFI and lots in the surrounding area.

It is a very charming and minimalistic flat in the heart of the city, close to San Telmo and other interesting spots. His flat and the building have this nostalgic feeling that I was looking for. And the 120-year old lift just adds to it! What else can I say that it is not in the pictures? Andreas was an excellent host and very accomodating to my needs. Highly recommended.
Andreas' place is very clean, nice, and he is very responsive. Would definitely recommend.

This is an outstanding apartment and experience for Buenos Aires. Both hosts went out of their way to help my stay be unforgettable! The space itself is gorgeous and centrally located. It was the perfect spot for exploring Buenos Aires. I hope to return and hope to stay here, it was that good. Highly recommend staying here.
Localização e decoração ótimas, há alguns problemas com umidade e wifi um pouco lento.
If you want a kind, flexible host with a great (but also quiet) location near all of the popular areas of BA then this is your guy and place.  I would absolutely stay here again.
Nice place.

Loved my stay here, great location and beautiful old building. Heaps of restaurants close by and lots of good walks around investigating the little shops. Andreas was an excellent host and if I'm back in Argentina I would definitely stay here again. Thanks
Andreas was a great host. Communicated well and had everything ready for me when I needed it. The loft is beautiful and reminded me of a place I'd like to live one day.

We stayed here for a couple of nights and loved it! The apartment is a great size, and had everything we needed. It is well located, and in cases where we had to travel longer distances, taxis are cheap and readily available. Thanks for having us!

Andreas is such a friendly host. He was always available and I even messaged us during our stay to make sure we were okay. The place is exactly as the photos show in a bohemian 4th floor loft. We stayed during a particularly cold few days but Andreas had 3 space heaters to keep us warm. The apartment is very central and in walking distance to the downtown area and San Telmo.
The apartment is clean, modern, and stylish. Beds are comfortable, bath and shower were great, all details accounted for!! Andreas was a great host, would definitely return.

Le petit loft d'Andreas est très sympathique, décoration sobre dans un immeuble pittoresque. Il es bien placé pour visiter Buenos Aires, notamment les parties Centre et Est, qui sont accessibles à pied si vous aimer un peu marcher. L'équipement est complet et en bon état. Andreas est un hôte discret et efficace. J'ai malheureusement eu beaucoup de pluie, vu la saison, mais je suis sûr que le loft est génial durant l'été austral.  En résumé, un logement parfait pour un célibataire ou un couple visitant BA pour la première fois.
Great place! Great location - walkable to many Buenos Aires must sees. Andreas was very easy to communicate with throughout the stay. Would definitely stay again :)
The apartment was amazing and was in a nice area. Andreas was very accommodating and quick to respond. I had a great time staying here.
Great place to stay while being in Buenos Aires.

We had a great stay at Andreas's place. It was super close to bike hire and some good restaurants, and easy walking distance to San Telmo. There was an exceptional deluge on one of the days we stayed, which lead to a bit of window leakage, but Andreas was immediately responsive and couldn't have been more helpful.  The loft is cute, has a wonderfully comfortable bed, and the building has a great old cage elevator that makes you feel like you're in a '40s Euro-noir. A lovely spot to stay that's a little out of the tourist rush, but perfectly mid-way between the rawer south of La Boca and middle class north of Palermo.
This place is awesome and Andi is an awesome host! He's very communicative and was very flexible with our check in and check out time. The location is great too. Highly recommend
Loved this place and it's hosts! Very chic accommodations in a convenient neighborhood. Would absolutely stay here again.
It's even better than the photos. Good location, well insulated from street noise. Excellent value. Great host. Would gladly stay again. Thanks Andreas!
Wonderfull small loft. Vert good location ans Andréas was really kind ans helpful.

Andreas es un anfitrión muy simpático y disponible. El piso es agradable, luminoso, grande y bien ubicado. Nos encanto.

Andreas est un hôte accueillant, arrangeant et trés sympatique. L'appartement est grand, limineux et tres bien situé. Super séjour.
Everything is positive about the place and Andreas is a wonderful  host
Andreas foi um anfitrião perfeito, muito atencioso e preocupado com o nosso bem-estar. O lugar é um loft em um prédio antigo, porem com uma decoração bem moderna e agradável, vale a pena conferir!

Great place to spend a few days in Buenos Aires! The pictures represent exactly the loft! Lots of natural light, in a wonderful and well renovated loft. 
The neighborhood is also very nice. Thanks Andreas for the stay!
Ótimo local, ótima localização e ótimos anfitriões! Uma excelente opção para viver Buenos Aires
Good place to stay.

Great place and I would stay here again in a heartbeat. It's in a gorgeous old building but completely redone inside respecting the old features. I felt like I was living in Buenos Aires. 

There is no airco but 2 strong fans. We were there when it was 35 degrees Celsius and it was more than comfortable. 

I would fully recommend this place. Great wifi, close to San Telmo. Direct bus to Palermo. Uber is very inexpensive as well so it's easy to get everywhere.

Andreas의 숙소는 매우 청결했고 깔끔한 인테리어에 항상 밝은 분위기로 생활할 수 있었어요. 에어컨은 없지만 거실 위에 설치된 큰 선풍기와 큰 창문으로 오는 바람이 시원했어요! Andreas가 바로 옆집에 거주하고 있어서 도움이 필요할 때나 궁금한 것이 있을 때 즉시 물어볼 수  있었고 카사로사다, 플로리다거리, 콩그레소광장, 남미사랑호스텔 등 부에노스아이레스의 주요 관광지와 도보 20분 내외 거리에 위치해있어요.

I really recommend that place
 My friend and I had a very relaxed time, you have everything you need. In the apartment you dont expect to be in a big city, but as soon as you walk 5 min, you have everything what a city can offer and it is close to the "microcenter". We felt very good, thanks to Andreas!!!A lot of tips, very friendly and just to recommend!thank you!

This place was wonderful - fantastic location near center areas with easy access to public transportation routes. Beautiful spot - I wanted to stay forever. Great communication with host. Couldn't think of anything to improve - it was great! Highly recommend.
Great value, charming spot

We really enjoyed staying at Andreas Place. There was everything we needed and on top of that the apartment was furnished and decorated with much love and a lot of good taste. Andreas was always there when we had questions and helped us where we needed help. Furthermore it was very easy to get around the city and there where a lot of little markets and shops near the flat.

Andreas' appartment is beautiful, well situated and very quiet for the heart of BA. We travelled with 2 small kids and it was just perfect, comfortable and on walkable distance to a lot of sightseeing.
Andreas was very helpful and available, thank you very much ! We will be sure to come back here.

I stayed in Andreas's appartment for a month while I was learning Spanish. This appartment looks exactly the same as the pictures, new furnished. There's 2 couchs in the house, one is located in the living room and the other one is on the 2nd floor(that one is perfect for chilling with friends). 
The appartment is bright enough during the day so it is perfect for doing homework. Also the location is great, bus stop in the corner, few blocks to subte. Also you can easily buy your food to cook, there's a vegetable store in the same block, bakery, meat shop and supermarket are 1 block away. 
Safe area, quiet and convenience. I am highly recommend you to stay here if you are going to visit BsAs.

Amazing loft, beautiful style, well equiped. Very spacious and nice sitting areas. Andreas and Hernan are terrific hosts, very kind and helpful. Gave us some good tips. We were allowed to leave our luggage early in the morning upon arrival day and check out later in the afternoon. Perfect location and very safe. Nearby bike rental shop. Overall we had a great stay. Thanks guys!!
